cocktails.name: Mojito Passion
cocktails.instructions: Muddle ingredients together; Fill glass with ice; Stir; Top up with more ice and soda water

cocktails.name: White Ukrainian
cocktails.instructions: Pour the alcohol in the glass; Shake milk with ice; Fill up glass with ice; Strain foamed milk into the glass

cocktails.name: Dark and Stormy
cocktails.instructions: Fill glass with ice; Pour in lime; Pour ginger beer 1.5cm from the top; Pour dark rum on top

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the glass; Stir; Fill up with ice; Top up with lemon soda

cocktails.name: Hello Limoncello
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the glass; Stir; Fill up with ice; Top up with lemon tonic

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the glass; Stir; Fill up with ice; Top up with lemon soda

cocktails.name: Sour Passion
cocktails.instructions: Fill up with ice; Add all ingredients to the glass; Stir; Top up with more ice and soda water

cocktails.name: June Sour
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the shaker; Shake with ice; Double strain into the glass filled with ice; Use the sifon to top up with meringue

cocktails.name: Okiku
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the shaker; Double shake first with ice then without; Fine strain into the glass

cocktails.name: Rhubarb Sour
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the shaker; Double shake first with ice then without; Fine strain into the glass

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the shaker; Hard shake with ice; Double strain into the glass

cocktails.name: Not a Cosmo
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the shaker; Double shake first with ice then without; Fine strain into the glass

cocktails.name: Lemon Moon
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the shaker; Shake with ice; Double strain into the glass filled with ice; Use the sifon to top up with meringue

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the shaker; Shake with ice; Strain into the glass; Top up with crushed ice

cocktails.name: Italian Sidecar
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to the shaker; Double shake first with ice then without; Fine strain into the glass

cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktails.instructions: Add Ice to the glass; Pour Aperol and then prosecco; Stir and top up with more ice; Top up with soda water

cocktails.name: GTâ€™s
cocktails.instructions: Add ice to the glass; Pour gin; Stir to cool down the gin; Add more ice; Pour the specific tonic 1cm from the rim of the glass
